dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 758 IH: Utah Land Sovereignty Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Stewart (for himself, Mr. Bishop of Utah, Mr. Chaffetz, Mr. Jones, Mr. Cramer, and Mrs. Lummis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Utah except by express authorization of Congress.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Utah Land Sovereignty Act.

section.header: Limitation on further extension or establishment of national monuments in Utah
section.text: The proviso of the last sentence of the first section of the Act of September 14, 1950 (64 Stat. 849, chapter 950; 16 U.S.C. 431a), is amended by inserting or Utah after Wyoming.
